author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-847: camel-mina should be exchange pattern agnostic. default behavioir changed: option sync is now true (it is confusing for end users why camel will not wait for a response when its calling a remote server).

author: dion
msg: add support for BigInteger and BigDecimal in JEXL arithmetic.
If either the left or right operands are BigD or BigI, the result is returned as that type
